thread.title: Soap | Fair City

author: Fiona Flynn
title: Soap | Fair City
text: Ah here, that's not your wife Wayne! Nor Farrah's husband either. However a moment of weakness finds the pair of them in this bit of a shift after they have a heart to heart over their respective marriage problems. This kiss certainly isn't going to do anything to help either of them anyways. Meanwhile, Charlotte is delighted when Decco insists that Sash should say with them when she gets out, while Sash also admits to Charlotte that Nina is her girlfriend, and Charlotte of course pretends to be none the wiser. Elsewhere, Eoghan goes ahead and calls Deegan over Tommy. Debbie then feels awful when Deegan later confirms that Tommy was not in fact behind the mugging. Someone needs to cut Tommy a break, it's not like he psychotically stalked someone and then shot their partner. Oh wait...
